fields.name: id
fields.description: PUDL-issued surrogate key.

fields.name: utility_id_ferc
fields.description: FERC-assigned identification number for each respondent utility.

fields.name: report_year
fields.description: Report year.

fields.name: project_num
fields.description: FERC Licensed Project No.

fields.name: plant_name
fields.description: Plant name.

fields.name: plant_kind
fields.description: Plant Construction type (Conventional or Outdoor).

fields.name: construction_year
fields.description: Year originally constructed.

fields.name: installation_year
fields.description: Year last unit was installed.

fields.name: capacity_mw
fields.description: Total installed capacity.

fields.name: peak_demand_mw
fields.description: Net peak demand on plant-megawatts (60 minutes).

fields.name: plant_hours_connected_while_generating
fields.description: Hours plant is connected to load.

fields.name: plant_capability_mw
fields.description: Net plant capability in megawatts.

fields.name: avg_num_employees
fields.description: Average number of employees.

fields.name: net_generation_mwh
fields.description: Net generation, exclusive of plant use, in megawatt hours.

fields.name: energy_used_for_pumping_mwh
fields.description: Energy used for pumping.

fields.name: net_load_mwh
fields.description: Net output for load in megawatt hours.

fields.name: capex_land
fields.description: Capital expense for land and land rights.

fields.description: Capital expense for structures and improvements.

fields.name: capex_facilities
fields.description: Capital expense for reservoirs, dams, and waterways.

fields.name: capex_wheels_turbines_generators
fields.description: Capital expense for water wheels, turbines, and generators.

fields.name: capex_equipment_electric
fields.description: Capital expense for accessory electric equipment.

fields.name: capex_equipment_misc
fields.description: Capital expense for miscellaneous powerplant equipment.

fields.name: capex_roads
fields.description: Capital expense for roads, railroads, and bridges.

fields.name: asset_retirement_cost
fields.description: Asset retirement costs.

fields.name: capex_plant_total
fields.description: Total capital expenses.

fields.name: capex_per_mw
fields.description: Total capital expenses per megawatt.

fields.name: opex_operations
fields.description: Operating expenses due to operation, supervision, and engineering.

fields.name: opex_water_for_power
fields.description: Operating expenses due to water for power.

fields.description: Operating expenses due pumped storage expenses.

fields.name: opex_electric
fields.description: Operating expenses due to electrical expenses.

fields.name: opex_generation_misc
fields.description: Operating expenses due to miscellaneous pumped storage power generation expenses.

fields.name: opex_rents
fields.description: Operating expenses due to rents.

fields.name: opex_engineering
fields.description: Operating expenses due to maintenance, supervision, and engineering.

fields.name: opex_structures
fields.description: Operating expenses due to maintenance of structures.

fields.name: opex_dams
fields.description: Operating expenses due to maintenance of reservoirs, dams, and waterways.

fields.name: opex_plant
fields.description: Operating expenses due to maintenance of electric plant.

fields.description: Operating expenses due to maintenance of miscellaneous pumped storage plant.

fields.description: Operating expenses before pumping expenses
